data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Benine, Ricardo C., Lopes, Guilherme A. M. (2008): A new species of Hyphessobrycon (Characiformes: Characidae) from río Portuguesa, río Orinoco basin, Venezuela. Zootaxa 1747: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181686
